tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"勇猛","italic": false,"color":"white"}',Lore:['{"text":"冷却与储存在经验条中显示。","color":"gray","italic": false}','[{"text":"手持该药水时，","italic": false,"color":"gray"}]','[{"text":"范围内的队友头顶出现队伍颜色粒子。","italic": false,"color":"gray"}]','{"text":"可惜牧师自己并不能带上力量效果。","color":"gray","italic": false}','""','[{"italic": false,"text":"[","color":"white"},{"keybind":"key.use","color":"white"},{"text":"]","color":"white"},{"text":"自己饮用时：","color":"gray","italic": false}]','[{"text":"ᛥ 药效  ","italic": false,"color":"red"},{"text":"速度 III","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"⌛ 持续时长  ","italic": false,"color":"gold"},{"text":"5 秒","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','""','[{"italic": false,"text":"[","color":"white"},{"keybind":"key.swapOffhand","color":"white"},{"text":"]","color":"white"},{"text":"作用于含自己 8 格内的非牧师队友时：","italic": false,"color":"gray"}]','[{"text":"ᛥ 药效  ","italic": false,"color":"red"},{"text":"力量 I & 速度 II","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"⌛ 持续时长  ","italic": false,"color":"gold"},{"text":"6 秒","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','""','[{"text":"⚜ 储存  ","italic": false,"color":"gold"},{"text":"2 瓶","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"✳ 冷却  ","italic": false,"color":"aqua"},{"text":"25 秒 (白昼)","italic": false,"color":"white"},{"text":" / 15 秒 (夜晚)","italic": false,"color":"dark_gray"}]','[{"text":"✏ 细节  按 [","color":"dark_gray","italic": false},{"keybind":"key.drop"}, "] 收起详情"]']},HideFlags:63}
